item.title: Large flytip blocking pavement - 100 Belgrave Road, 10th August
item.description:
Please could the council fine the people using info on all the boxes. They were dumped overnight, out of hours and are blocking the pavement. Common outside 100 Belgrave Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 90, Belgrave Road, Pimlico, London

item.title: Between 20&22 Harvist Road, 10th August
item.description:
This tree is very large and overshadows any street lighting. The roots are breaking through the pavement. Not only does it block light and view it is a hazard ro nearby properties and can cause extensive damage to our foundation. A tree should never get to this size and should be regularly checked and maintained. This is what paying council tax is for.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Harvist Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Fly-tip Large - More than a van load

item.title: Unknown vehicle backed at my parking space, 10th August
item.description:
I came home on Saturday 02/08/2025 and noticed a vehicle parked outside my house number 22 Hartslock drive , SE2 9UR on my parking space . I thought it was someone visiting a neighbour. But since then, the vehicle still remains. I investigated from neighbours but no one knows who the owner is. I will like the vehicle to be removed asap . Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hartslock Drive, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly Tipping mixed with poor street cleaning, 10th August
item.description:
The council has allowed MHO on Castillon Road in multiple houses, ( I have no issues with this apart from some of them house people with know problems which mean they don't naturally look after the surrounding areas - people have to live somewhere) however the council fails to take monies from these landlords to clear the streets leading to litter and then fly Tipping on side road, you can walk down and dumping of household waste that will cause fire next to my wooden fencing and property which this is evidence of and council will be liable for damages

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wingrove Road, Downham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
